sentences.en: But we can move these discussions forward in a spirit of partnership rather than rancor.
sentences.cn: 但是我们仍然可以本着合作的精神推进这些磋商,不再纠缠于相互的积怨.

sentences.en: Give us the ballot and we will quietly and nonviolently, without rancor or bitterness, implement the Supreme Court's decision of May 17, 1954.
sentences.cn: 给我们选举权，我们就会平静非暴力，不引起怨恨和苦难，使1954年5月17日最高法院的决议生效

sentences.en: He has no rancor at heart against you .
He have no rancor at heart against you.
I have no rancor against him.
If he led the blacks fought against, it will only lead and deeper racial rancor.
sentences.cn: 尽管路德金领导黑人抵抗种族歧视的不公正法律,但被捕时依然服从, 否则会加深矛盾.

sentences.en: In fact, he sympathized with one of the prisoners for killing the rancor beast.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 他很同情死囚中那位杀掉兰克兽的人.

sentences.en: Jabba was incensed , and threw the poacher and his quartet of Yuzzum into the rancor pit.
sentences.cn: 恼羞成怒的贾巴将绑匪和他的五个亚扎姆人扔进了兰克洞.

sentences.en: Look at his eyes! He has so much rancor for the boss.
sentences.cn: 看他的眼睛! 他对老板充满仇恨.

sentences.en: Make every day as wonderful as you can and enjoy this time rancor.
sentences.cn: 尽你的能力让你的每一天都精彩无比吧,然后不带仇恨地让自己去享受现在的美好时光.

sentences.en: The subject of this rancor is the'uptick'rule.
sentences.cn: 这场论战的焦点就是 “ 加价规则”.

sentences.en: Their rancor dated from a political dogfight between them.
sentences.cn: 他们的积怨来自于他们之间在政治上的狗咬狗.
